snippet: Gargi Datta, the former girlfriend of the accused Aurora gunman, said in court on Thursday that Mr. Holmes had mused unsettlingly about evil and justice.
abstract: Former girlfriend Gargi Datta testifies at trial of accused Aurora, Colo, gunman James E Holmes; describes Holmes as awkward and introverted man who mused unsettlingly about evil and justice, though she says she had no inkling that he was amassing arsenal of guns or planning rampage that claimed 12 lives.
lead_paragraph: Gargi Datta, the former girlfriend of the accused Aurora gunman, said in court on Thursday that Mr. Holmes had mused unsettlingly about evil and justice.

headline.main: James Holmes’s Ex-Girlfriend Recalls Awkwardness and Ghoulish Remarks
headline.print_headline: Ex-Girlfriend of Aurora Gunman Recalls Awkwardness and Ghoulish Remarks
